text: Hello HubDB people, I need some frank feedback on using HubDB to support multiple layers of filters. We want to build on HubSpot but there is a lot of concern and reservation about being able to support a product finder that will employ multiple sorting options to provide the prospects with results. We do not have a psd. This is a link to InVision mocking up the topic level of this functionality. <https://lmgresults.invisionapp.com/d/main#/console/13235550/276632323/preview>
can't see your preview, but it's definitely possible to have multiple filters on a single hubdb
Agreed, weve done it for a real estate client a few times
